mapper.insert: insert into member(mem_email, mem_pw, mem_nick, mem_tel, mem_address) values(#{mem_email}, #{mem_pw}, #{mem_nick}, #{mem_tel}, #{mem_address})
mapper.select: select * from member where mem_email = #{mem_email} and mem_pw = #{mem_pw}
select * from member where id not like 'admin'
select mem_email from member where mem_email = #{mem_email}
select mem_nick from member where mem_nick = #{mem_nick}
